headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for the [ARRIS DCX960 / VIP5002W](https://github.com/jsiegenthaler/homebridge-eosstb/blob/master/README.md) or [HUMAX EOS1008R / 2008C](https://github.com/jsiegenthaler/homebridge-eosstb/blob/master/README.md) set-top box on the UPC TV platform.
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see [this version's README](https://www.npmjs.com/package/homebridge-eosstb), or [the current README](https://github.com/jsiegenthaler/homebridge-eosstb/blob/master/README.md#configuration) and the [Wiki](https://github.com/jsiegenthaler/homebridge-eosstb/wiki).

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log. Default: EOSSTB

country.title: Country
country.description: Your country. This controls the country-specific logon sequence and the mqtt sessions.

username.title: Username
username.description: Your username for your TV account.

password.title: Password
password.description: Your password associated with your TV account.

authmethod.title: Authentication Method
authmethod.description: The authentication method. Select the option for your country. If it doesn't work, try another method.

watchdogDisabled.title: Disable Session Watchdog
watchdogDisabled.description: Disables the session watchdog to assist with debugging. Default: false

doublePressTime.title: Double-Press Time
doublePressTime.description: The amount of time in ms to detect double-tap of an iOS remote control button. Default: 250ms

triplePressTime.title: Triple-Press Time
triplePressTime.description: The amount of time in ms to detect triple-tap of an iOS remote control button. Default: 800ms.

masterChannelListValidFor.title: Master Channel List Validity Time
masterChannelListValidFor.description: The amount of time in seconds that the master channel list is valid. Channel list is refreshed when the time expires. Default: 1800s.

debugLevel.title: Debug Level
debugLevel.description: Enables extra logging for this plugin. Default: None.

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Each set-top box is a device. This plugin supports multiple devices. Device config is optional; the plugin will still work if no devices are configured.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Unique deviceId used to identify the device. The deviceId is visible in the Homebridge log shortly after a Homebridge restart.

name.title: Name
name.description: The device name. Default: the current device name

syncName.title: Sync Name
syncName.description: Enables syncing of the device name with the set-top box name. Default: true

accessoryCategory.title: Icon
accessoryCategory.description: The icon displayed on the tile in Home app. Default: Set-Top Box

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The manufacturer name to display in the Home app. Default: auto-detected.

modelName.title: Model
modelName.description: The model name to display in the Home app. Default: auto-detected.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: The serial number to display in the Home app. Default: auto-detected.

firmwareRevision.title: Firmware
firmwareRevision.description: The firmware version to display in the Home app. Numbers only eg 4.44. Default: plugin version.

profile.title: Profile Name
profile.description: Use a profile to manage channels shown in the Home app. Default: Shared Profile

channelOrder.title: Channel Sort By
channelOrder.description: Select how the channels should be sorted in the channel list. Default: Most Watched

maxChannels.title: Max Channels
maxChannels.description: Limit the maximum channels to load in the channel list. Default: 95

showChannelNumbers.title: Show Channel Numbers
showChannelNumbers.description: Show or hide channel numbers in the channel list. Default: false

volUpCommand.title: Volume Up Command
volUpCommand.description: An executable command to increase the volume. The command is executed by the plugin on Homebridge, and must work on the platform running Homebridge.

volDownCommand.title: Volume Down Command
volDownCommand.description: An executable command to reduce the volume. The command is executed by the plugin on Homebridge, and must work on the platform running Homebridge.

muteCommand.title: Mute Command
muteCommand.description: An executable command to mute the sound. The command is executed by the plugin on Homebridge, and must work on the platform running Homebridge.

customPictureMode.title: Custom Picture Mode
customPictureMode.description: Allow Picture Mode to be used for other custom functionality, see README for full details.

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: Add custom channel names for any special channels (such as Netflix) where the channel name cannot be auto-detected by the plugin.

channelId.title: Channel ID
channelId.description: Unique channelId, see the Homebridge log.

channelKeyMacro.title: Channel Key Macro
channelKeyMacro.description: A sequence of remote control keys for enhanced customising. Channel ID must be empty to use key macros. Example: '1 2 3 Enter' to select channel 123. See the Wiki for a description of all keys.

layout.title: Mandatory Platform Config *
layout.description: The minimum EOSSTB config items that must be configured.

layout.title: Optional Platform Config
layout.description: Customise the platform config and set the debug level in this section.

layout.title: Optional Device Config
layout.description: Customise and fine tune your device config in this section.
